message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. I believe it's worth more than what you're looking for, but I understand your budget. Let's make this work for both of us. I propose we set the price at $100. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I'm interested in your product, $100 is a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'd be happy to pay $85 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. I understand your budget constraints, and I'd like to make a proposal that might better suit your needs. How about we consider the product priced at $90? This still offers you a good deal while allowing me to cover my costs. I hope this suggestion works for you.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. $90 is still a bit too high for me, but I'm willing to go up to $87. This is my final offer.  Let me know if it works for you.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I value your interest and am willing to accommodate your budget. Considering all factors, I propose we finalize the deal at $88 for the product. I believe this price strikes a fair balance between our interests. Please let me know if this works for you.

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to come down on price. I'm close to my budget limit though, and I can only go up to $85. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price. If it doesn't work, I'll have to go with John's offer.
